name: Offroad Euro Truck Driver Game
description:
Are you fan of drifting, racing or want to drive euro trucks in hilly areas then DOWNLOAD Offroad Euro Truck Driver Game and enjoy everything you want.

Offroad Euro Truck Driver Game has DIFFERENT Modes:

Truck Drifting Mode:

The ultimate drift racing experience in the most realistic drifting game around. Drive legendary drift trucks on different tracks, beat records, take part in different drift racing events, rise from Beginner to Professional League truck driver.

Circuit Race Mode:

One of best real circuit racing game to give you best experience of circuit racing and chasing other super monster trucks with your Euro Truck. It will be not easy like driving in a single line you need to push your Super Truck with maximum power and beat everyone.

Lap Knockout Mode:

In Knockout championship, you have to compete with other truck drivers and stay in racing contest if you’re on last position at the end of Lap you’ll be out so burn your tires and asphalt racing track and win truck championship.

Time Trial Mode:

A time trial is a concept where players race against the clock to get the fastest time possible. Beat the given time and cross every point and became champ of euro truck driver game.

Speed trap Mode:

Speed trap is the fastest point on the racing circuit. The speed trap is used to obtain and compare the fastest speeds amongst drivers. Accelerate your truck speed as fast as you can and beat all time record of Speed trap.

Checkpoint Mode:

In this Truck driving mode you have to reach the checkpoints before the time Elimination, Show best asphalt speeding performance in drift racing tracks.

Offroad Euro Truck driver game FEATURES:

- Drift in realist asphalt tracks
- Euro Truck Racing Game in 3D hilly environment.
- Acceleration options: auto and manual.
- Steering options: tilt and touch
- Real Physics for Truck balance
- Laps Setting and Difficulty Setting and Graphics setting.
- Choose opponents players and their difficulty setting.


NOTE: Offroad Euro Truck Driver Game doesn't require an internet connection after installation! Long live offline games!
If you like to play high-end racing games, get ready to spend many hours playing Offroad Euro Truck Driver Game. Enjoy your time and give us your precious feedback!
